title: President Joe Biden: Arrest of dissident journalist by Belarus 'a direct affront to international norms'
content:
1. President Joe Biden: Arrest of dissident journalist by Belarus 'a direct affront to international norms'  USA TODAY
  2. Detained Belarusian dissident appears in video as fury mounts over 'hijacking' of Ryanair flight  CNN
